job.title: QA Automation Engineer Selenium
job.description:
We are looking to assure professional QA for an engineering application. While the development team is delivering the application (which consists of a Single Page Web Application, a back-end server and communication with a multitude of third-party APIs), the present job is about assuring a professional testing, creating automatic tests and a professional QA report / Quality Planning.

You will be working with a development team to:
•	Develop an automated testing framework in accordance with company’s policy and project’s needs.
•	Create a Quality Delivery Plan.
•	Develop, implement, and document the test strategy for the project.
•	Create and document test plans and test case scenarios.
•	Design, create, and execute manual and automated test cases.

Your expertise will be needed to:
•	Take the lead in the Quality Assurance process, including presenting the quality status report for each sprint / milestone.
•	Participate at all periodic meetings (daily, monthly or quarterly meetings).
•	Evaluate the quality of the applications, addressing any concerns or issues proactively - communicate results (blockers or successes) to the team and to the customer.

More details about the requirements:
•	Visual Studio
•	Azure Devops
•	.NET C#
•	Selenium WebDriver and IDE

Nice to have / know:
•	SQL
•	ISTQB certification

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a QA Automation Engineer with expertise in Selenium to join our team on a project that will last for more than 6 months. As a QA Automation Engineer, you will be responsible for designing and implementing test automation frameworks using Selenium WebDriver. 

The ideal candidate should have a strong background in software QA and web testing, with proficiency in .NET Core and Azure DevOps. Experience in designing test cases and executing automated tests is a must. 

To be considered for this role, please submit a proposal outlining how you can contribute to this project. We would like to know about your previous experience in building test automation frameworks, your familiarity with Selenium, and your ability to work with Azure DevOps. Additionally, please provide links to any relevant past projects you have completed.
